website_summaries.verdict: Low priced modeling tool kit that delivers the basic items you need for building and repairing.
pros: Handy tools for model kit building that are aimed at beginners
Tools are of a higher quality than you'd expect at this price point
Safe materials used in the tweezers, so you don't have to worry about harsh chemicals
cons: Advanced modelers won't find much to like in this tool kit

customer_reviews.title: Cutters broke
customer_reviews.text: I tried to cut my first model and the cutters broke on the plastic. I contacted customer service and I am waiting to see what can be done.
customer_reviews.author: thomas bondi

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner's Kit and Exceptiinal Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beginners tool kit for plastic model makers. The items pictured are what was received. The snips do get more dull as they are used but lasted just as long as a $12 pair of Testors brand snips. The exacto style blade will not last past a single model build, but again, the cost of the whole kit is about what an Exacto brand blade costs. The files are durable and very useful and the fact that a metal file is included is great. The tweezers are very pointy and perfect for decal application. This is a great beginner's kit and an exceptional value.
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: Solid beginner's modeling kit!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid beginners tool kit! I'm currently working on my second model and all of the pieces in this kit are more or less useful. The thicker filing stick is the one you'll want to use more than not when sanding down nub marks on your kit ,as the thinner one will mark up your plastic quite a bit. Even then that's more my fault than anyone else's. Inexpensive and convinient. If you're looking for a hobby kit to get your hands dirty with gunpla I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible quality, and worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This kit is an incredible starter set for anybody looking to get into modeling/miniature assembling. I have put together a whole army of Warhammer figurines after purchasing this set, and the combination of the precision cutters, precision knife, and various grits of emery boards have helped me tremendously for making them look professionally assembled. This kit has everything you need to prep models for display-level quality. My only complaint is that the emery boards seem to wear out quick when using them, however they still get the job done well. And the knife isn't the sharpest, however, it still gets done what is needed as well.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Ninness

customer_reviews.title: The clipper alone makes this a fantastic buy!
customer_reviews.text: I recently got into model building and was using a pair of scissors to cut the pieces from the sheets and an exacto knife + metal file to clean them up. It was a tedious process and produced countless little flakes of plastic. The clipper in this set changed my life. It can get right up against the pieces and it's so sharp that it makes a clean cut every time. I rarely have to touch up the pieces after cutting them out. I haven't used the other tools yet, but the clipper alone makes this a fantastic buy for anyone looking to build models.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good For Beginners not for Experienced Modelers
customer_reviews.text: This is good if you just want something to start out with, but as an experienced modeler, it is very cheaply made. 1.) Tweezers bend easily 2.) sanding stick gets ripped with minimal use. 3.) xacto blade tips break off when cleaning parts or cutting cardboard, styrene, exc overall I would recommend this as a beginner starter kit, as it is so cheap (under $10) but if you are more experienced. Not worth it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great Tools and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I have been modeling for years and have been using only a few tools. This kit offers tools I never used, like the cutters and special tweezers as well as the files. I wish I would have had them before. Also they are very well made. Recommended for anyone who models and does craft work. A lot of value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Lanke

customer_reviews.title: Cheap decent starter set, but be aware it's cheap and flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these about a month ago getting into Warhammer. Now what I can say is if they were of slightly higher quality this would be a great deal, but you are certainly getting what you paid for. These are very cheapo items, not very high quality and prone to break with lots of use. The pliers completely broke for me a few weeks ago and the knife is horribly flimsy. The blades that come with it are so dull your going to struggle to get any mold lines with it. The remaining tools are pretty okay, but those two pieces are pretty important so them being trash kinda ruins this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Braden Coker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice starter kit. Good quality nips and everything you need for your first gunpla
customer_reviews.author: Juan A. De Jesus

customer_reviews.title: small issue with this is the finer grit board becomes pretty useless pretty quick
customer_reviews.text: The only, small issue with this is the finer grit board becomes pretty useless pretty quick, the nippers are awesome,t he tweezers and knife are great. Everythign else works well.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Kalogeras

customer_reviews.title: Great beginners and as travel kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I go to a monthly hobby meeting that we build models at and I needed the tools to take with me. This was perfect with the handy case. I recently used it for a home build to test it out, I used most of the tools from this kit and they worked great.Highly recommended for travel and beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Van Waterschoot

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME little tool kit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to further enjoy assembling scale models. Works great for separating the pieces off the trees and for filing down the rough spots. Great gift for the hobby enthusiast!
customer_reviews.author: Coconut Lover

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your Buck.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bang-for-your-buck hobby building set you can get on Amazon. Less than $10 and you get 3 different files, a great nipper, an x-acto knife and some other handy stuff. Second week since it arrived and it's holding up well, just ordered another set for my brother. One thing to note, though, is the nippers were EXTREMELY good and sharp but only for about the first 5 minutes. They dull out quick but they're still able to get the job done well.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool set for modelers
customer_reviews.text: Any hobbyist who is serious about their model works will have a set like this. It has all the tools you will need for removing parts from the sprues, trimming off flash and smoothing off the moulding seam lines, making the parts as realistic as possible. Good purchase. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel Berry

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Just as described although I still have to actually use it
customer_reviews.text: Yup. All the parts are there and accounted for. Using it to build a model that’s too advanced for my son to do himself so I have to put it together myself. Hence a non model assembling mom buying this thing. Send help.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit.
customer_reviews.text: This kit has all the basic essential tools a new modeler would need to get started. Got these for both my sons so they would leave mine alone. Tools are decent quality and allows a novice how to use the tools well before moving up to more expensive tools.
customer_reviews.author: Mosol

customer_reviews.title: Great model tool kit for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I love this product as it contains all the basic tools for assembling a model. I used it for building up my first ship model and it works great. I love those polishing bars but they wouldn't endure after several times of polishing works. I wish they would sell some refills for those bars.
customer_reviews.author: HAN SOLO

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: When you consider that it's only $10 for everything you need to start building a model kit, it's a very good value. This is a good kit to accompany a model kit you're giving to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: nice beginners kit
customer_reviews.text: this has been very handy for my first real attempt at model making, it has everything i've really needed to clean up pieces and work with decals and the like. while the tools are certainly cheap and won't last forever they are perfectly fine for my purposes right now.
customer_reviews.author: Jason olsen

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: The nippers on my set went bad after a month of occasional use. I bought a second box for my gf who is also getting into building scale models and hers arrived in better shape than mine originally. So I’m not sure if that has anything to do with the company that makes them or the hardline of the shipment. Overall it’s a good deal in my eyes. I wasn’t impressed with the blades and knife but besides that everything worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tools
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to have for building models. It comes with filers and snips to make the model truly beautiful. This made a great hobbies for my son and he love it so much. Also look for Gundam markers too. They make the model stand out. Great tool for the money.
customer_reviews.author: DanyoTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great value and range of tools if you're just starting out or need something basic.
customer_reviews.text: My 1st set of tools for my small collection of model kits. If your just starting and not sure u need all the other stuff that come with bigger kits, this fits perfectly especially for a good price. The quality of the tools is good/durable, the case is nice just make sure to be not too hard on it and you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: jose henao

customer_reviews.title: A must for scale model builders.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this model tool kit for my hobbies which are scale model building and model railroading. This tool kit has been invaluable for these and I use them daily. These tools are of excellent quality and I have had no issues with them so far. I recommend this item for anyone just starting out in the hobbies I mentioned above.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my model building friend, he still thanks me for it!! He said he never knew what he was missing out on and how hard he was making it. Great price, great tools!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great tools to get started!
customer_reviews.text: Keadic 9Pcs Gundam Model Tools Kit is a prefect starter set of tools. The quality of each individual tool is high. The snips cut through easily on almost all angles. The files are a great addition to smooth out surfaces. The screw drivers are also nice and I've used them for many projects, not just models.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Basically you get what you pay for. The pen knife gets untwisted very easily, and the cutter tool is easily bent and losses its sharpness quickly. I'm returning it and buying separate and little more pricey versions of these items. In a pinch or just starting out when your not sure if you want to start a hobby, then might be worth it. Otherwise, save your money and buy better items or a better set.
customer_reviews.author: H Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing tool set, Ive been using whatever I found laying around my house in order to do my builds so far, but with my purchase of the HGUC Hyaku Shiki Revive, I decided it was time for an upgrade, and I was not disappointed. Great for beginners at a really great price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hoehn

customer_reviews.title: Gifted for my Warhammer boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend plays Warhammer 40k and builds hundreds of models in order to build his "army". I purchased this set for him to be able to make them look cleaner and mainly for the cutting tool so that he can custom make guns for some of his models.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginner modelmakers and such
customer_reviews.text: The side cutters are surprisingly well made and sharp. I've yet to have any issues cutting parts off sprues. The only issue is that the whole kit smells very funky, like the rubber or whatever coating on the clippers was quite fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Tony R. Mays

customer_reviews.title: What a Great Collection !
customer_reviews.text: My husband does a lot of model planes...he's never had the proper tools. He's used my nail boards and fingernail scissors and needle nosed pliers...so this was a really wonderful upgrade. It's good to have the proper tools for the job at hand. If you're working with models, this is a great starter set of tools.
customer_reviews.author: NanaAnna

customer_reviews.title: Great little kit
customer_reviews.text: This little kit has everything you need to make miniatures or doll houses. There is a wire cutter,files and some excellent tweezers all of a higher quality than I would expect for the price of this kit.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lunsford

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a handy carrying case.
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a handy little carrying case. This is a stocking stuffer for my crafty little entrepreneur grandson. I will update once he uses it and lets me know what he thinks.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this set. He used to build models when he was younger, but hasn't built any in a long time. This kit has been very helpful as he is restarting his hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: These work, but know ahead of time they are quite cheap. The nippers are ok, but the tweezer tips will literally bend on grabbing something. An interesting cheap metal lol.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had them today, but I can tell the tools, aside from the sanding sticks, are going to last a very long time! The cutters are very sharp and worked very well! They also didn’t hurt my hand after prolonged use.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Ring

customer_reviews.title: They're fine.
customer_reviews.text: I'd only reccomend getting this if you're not sure about getting into model building. It's perfect for beginners, but eventually you'll have to get better cutters or you'll have to keep filing away.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: This kit makes model building so much easier you don’t have a little burgers you can make details you can get small pieces in we can’t get your big chubby fingers I am very happy with the quality and it’s just a good product
customer_reviews.author: Tim kalista

customer_reviews.title: Just wow
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! I bought this kit to help me get started in putting together Warhammer 40k models and its the perfect fit. The tools are great quality and have high durability. The two different angle tweezers are super sharp and precise! I was surprised all the tools quality considering the price. I will say the only downside is that the clippers doesnt have a great spring load to it. Takes a little bit to spring back. Besides that! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony K

customer_reviews.title: Good for simple gundams.
customer_reviews.text: This product is the one i used for my first gundam. It works very well, but for more complicated gundams other than hg gundams i would say get a more elaborate kit.
customer_reviews.author: Hi

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set for beginners or if you need tools for model building for cheap. I’ve put some good work into these tools and it was worth every penny. Buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Miniatures
customer_reviews.text: I use this to assemble Warhammer 40,000 miniatures. It has all of the necessary tools I need to remove molding imperfections. Great value for the quality and assortment of tools.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal at this price.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality tools. Every model builder should own this kit. The sprue cutter is worth $25 and the diamond file is indispensable.
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Small Projects
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tool kit for small construction and craft projects: models, figurines, etc. The durable storage case is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: InOrlando

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment for beginner modeler
customer_reviews.text: I am just getting into Gundam modeling and these tools are working perfectly. Everything I need is all there and they are durable. This is a good basic set, shipping was fast and I am happy with my purchase. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good kit
customer_reviews.text: Just started getting into modeling and love it. Got this little kit to help me out to not spend so much money, just in case I didnt like it. Well I've enjoyed it and this kit has everything
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Charland

customer_reviews.title: Handy set
customer_reviews.text: I like this set, it has just about everything you need to accomplish minor tasks. The tips on the tweezers are a little weak. I dropped the straighter ones, the tip bent, and i was able to bend them back by hand. Overall, happy with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard pass
customer_reviews.text: While using the tool set to cut a THIN piece of resin off a miniature the tool broke snapping back at me. Pass on this as it breaks easily.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J. Flagg

customer_reviews.title: a great kit
customer_reviews.text: A great tool kit for starters, or even people with actual skills (which is not me). The price was so good I bought a second one for my cousin.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Good starting kit
customer_reviews.text: Great starting kit for a beginner hobbiest. The knife is probably the weekest thing (worst thing in the kit but passable) in this kit but it brings extra blades so can't complain
customer_reviews.author: Jose G Garzon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and durable
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat the price of this kit. Realky nice for the value, so much so I bought another one for my minuature / war game building.
customer_reviews.author: MikeP

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with my first model set and I am very happy I did that. I used just about every tool in there and would have really struggled without it. Would definitely recommend getting this if you make models.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Runkel

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit. Has most of what you need to build your models. So much more for the price than if we had bought at the store where we buy the model kits. Easy for my sons (9 & 11) to use.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fiori

customer_reviews.title: Someone put together a good hobby set to make it easy to get into any of the many model hobbies
customer_reviews.text: For the beginner it is worth it. I wish I had something like this 40 years ago. I fought to find everything so I had to pick around to find what I needed and it was buy one item here and go to another store to buy another item and hope they are of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Shanks

customer_reviews.title: Great Model Building Kit!!
customer_reviews.text: He kit had everything I needed to build my models. I just wish that knew of it sooner, I would have purchased it years ago. Great value for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Nipper in horrible condition
customer_reviews.text: Everything else in the package was fine, but the 1 star is due to the nipper. The nipper had small, white plastic dusts on the tip, as if it were a used item. More importantly, the two tips weren't aligned properly, ending up with uneven cuts every time. I can expect this from a product after a long period of usage, but it is unacceptable for a new item to be in such condition.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cho

customer_reviews.title: Nicely put together box of tools
customer_reviews.text: Nice box of tools that fit nicely in the box. Comes in handy for my model boat project. Tools look durable, though I realize it isn’t snap-ons.
customer_reviews.author: Kjartan

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been Great. Lots of tools for your money, everything works as it should! Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: ShortySilly16

customer_reviews.title: Good kit to get started!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple models for my son to start, and bought this kit to go with it. Love the nippers, and the kit has everything we need to to basic things. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MaHammy

customer_reviews.title: A great selection for almost any situation
customer_reviews.text: A great selection for almost any situation. Better than using toe nail clippers or small scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Jarnagin

customer_reviews.title: great tool kit for models
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the tool kit I bought for building plastic model kits. Very reasonable priced and included all I needed to cut and sand parts. I would recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ron J

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as expected except for the knife. The blade will not tighten up enough to hold it .
customer_reviews.author: 1911BC

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these and it's not had a problem with him so however the Nippers are a little too big he needs some smaller ones
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Leonhart

customer_reviews.title: a great starter set for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I am part way through my miniature build, I have used many, but not all the tools yet, and thankful the kit has a good variety of tools, so I am making progress!
customer_reviews.author: cathy- another great bargain

customer_reviews.title: Good tool kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with the cutebee dollhouse. The tools came in handy, as I didn’t already have them.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: A must for gundam model building
customer_reviews.text: Works good for me perfect for my gundam models I’ve been building literally everting i need
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: very nice starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Really good starter kit, it have all you need to start with bandai hobby and is not so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben M.

customer_reviews.title: Wears out fast
customer_reviews.text: The blades are cheap. And wear out incredibly fast. Same with the files and clippers. Good for beginners tho. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Santana

customer_reviews.title: Great value overall
customer_reviews.text: The pliers work very well compared to another I bought separately that cost more than twice this bundle. At the time of this review, I've had this for a few weeks and have not encountered any issues. I've used it so far to build the RG Exia and the RG Sazabi. I highly recommend this tool kit. It has everything you need to start your gunpla hobby.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT KIT!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit for my brother to build his gundam model kits and it was a great buy! It has all the tools that he needed to build the kit and it's just awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Celina

customer_reviews.title: huge hands
customer_reviews.text: I have huge hands like basketball player hands. I love this kit because it makes my assemble skills.
customer_reviews.author: BESTEV

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: I need this to put together a Disney train, looks like these tools are up to the task.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Bunting

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable choice
customer_reviews.text: Came in 2 days comes in plastic storage container and going to be great for placing things in epoxy jewelry and building models.
customer_reviews.author: anthony rothacher

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: So it's not the best tools on the market. But it's less than $10 and it works! I'm just starting model building and I could not be happier with this little set. No, it wont be my forever kit but it couldn't be better for starting out.
customer_reviews.author: Squall1036

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy again
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done for building my gundam and armored core models. I would buy it again for sure
customer_reviews.author: Dawner

customer_reviews.title: Everything included, box wasnt broken upon arrival like most experience
customer_reviews.text: Came with everything pictured, Nippers are fairly sharp, enough to get you started, the exacto knife is simple yet effective and the files range in a very course to polish finish - the box had some scratches on the interior from the file and sanding sticks jiggling around but not broken like other buyers - more than enough for the low price it is, a great starter set to build upon for gundam building use.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo A

customer_reviews.title: File falling apart.
customer_reviews.text: Used it a few times and the sandpaper part of the file is coming loose but its nothing that cant be fixed with super glue. Good price for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Gift purchase
customer_reviews.text: My model makers enjoyed this product to use for the models I purchased
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia J Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Great for model building would not recommend for school age children unless supervised.
customer_reviews.author: James D.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner kit! Not so much for more experience modelers! The nippers are light and feel that way!
customer_reviews.author: takcopt45

customer_reviews.title: Tools
customer_reviews.text: Makes life easier the tweezers are crazy accurate for small pieces
customer_reviews.author: Fire Breather

customer_reviews.title: Came in sticky and dirty
customer_reviews.text: Despite being a cost effective tool set, for some reason all of mine came in with the handles sticky and the metal having some residue and small bits of haor on them. Very disgusting, but I was able to wash it off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Comes with the basics that you need to build more complex gundam.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: This kit provided the simple tools needed to work on model kits.
customer_reviews.text: This product was a perfect addition to the model I gave my nephew for Christmas. It has the necessary tools to get started on his model.
customer_reviews.author: melissa clay

customer_reviews.title: Great tool set
customer_reviews.text: Great tool set. Everything in the set is sturdy and worked very well for my hobby.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit to have.
customer_reviews.text: A good kit to have with some basic filling tools that get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Huston

customer_reviews.title: The nippers make this set worth it
customer_reviews.text: This kit is amazing, i use everything on my gundam model kits but the files and the exacto knife which both leave something to be desired, the nippers however are amazing and the tweezers make stickers much more easy to get on the kits.
customer_reviews.author: cro

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for a low cost
customer_reviews.text: Excellent modeling kit for a low cost, really appreciate the angled forceps a lot. Works great for any form of small model working. Excellent customer service. Perfectly sized case for convenient storage.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Mac

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Kasich 9pcs gundam model kit hobby building tool craft set good
customer_reviews.author: hieuphung

customer_reviews.title: Ok for being so cheap.
customer_reviews.text: The nippers are ok but do leave nub marks and can easily cut thur the part if not careful. The hobby knife blades get dull quick. I'm thinking about spending 30 plus on sum good nippers. Everything else in the kit is great.
customer_reviews.author: tre b.

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: ive never done gundam kits ever or any type of model kits. i mostly had to buy it by accident. but i am happy with the purchase that being said i read the reveiws and qeustion what i baught then i received it and i am happy with the results i just wish there was more sandpaper buffers. i can assure you that any defects are very rare if at all.
customer_reviews.author: donnie

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for beginners or masters of modeling,this kit will give you great results for proper fit of parts,this kit cost less than some sprue cutters alone
customer_reviews.author: Judy Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and well made
customer_reviews.text: Just started making Gunpla, and this kit has been fantastic; I’ve built two sets so far. The nippers have been sharp and precise, the tweezers have both been very useful for gunpla disassembly and placing decals. Haven’t done much filing, but I’ve made use of all the files in here. I’m glad I bought this set!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Everything I wanted and more, at a price that the local hobby shop can't hope to match.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Allessi

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You'll be glad you did!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic kit for the price! The cutters alone are worth it! The files are great too! Going to buy a back up kit!
customer_reviews.author: roland Kursar

customer_reviews.title: Great for first time builders
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my first build and it was great. Really cool set.
customer_reviews.author: robo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for models
customer_reviews.text: Useful for putting together Warhammer 40k models. The exacto knife IS sharp though, so be careful. My husband caught his finger pretty good on it, when it slipped.
customer_reviews.author: Allysin Vally

customer_reviews.title: Decent kit for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I am beginner myself. It’s a good kit and has many tools.
customer_reviews.author: Vjstormer

customer_reviews.title: Best starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Best thing i got very good for people that are starting hobby and it gives you all the tools
customer_reviews.author: marvel heroes

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Does what I wanted it to do when I purchased it; putting models together.
customer_reviews.author: adrian b

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for a beginner! Tamiya brand side cutter itself is $25. A side cutter is included in this kit for a total price of $10. Parts may not be as precise as brand name ones but it is such a steal considering the cost-effectiveness. Very happy about my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Keadic 9Pcs Gundam Model Tools Kit Hobby Building Tools Craft Set for Basic Model Building, Repairing and Fixing
product_meta.description:
Findfly 10Pcs Gundam Modeler Basic Tools Craft Set Hobby Building Tools kit for Professional Model Assemble Building.

Package Include: 
1Pcs x Side pliers
1Pcs x Manual model tools file
1Pcs x Pen knife 
1Pcs x 5Pcs spare blade
1Pcs x Polishing cloth
2Pcs x Double-sided polished bar
2Pcs x Tweezers 

Note:
Because the Modeler Basic Tools are very shape, so please use with care, and take they away from children.
feature_bullets: ✔ APPLICATION: The modeler basic tools set is suitable for a beginner and advanced modeler as well. You can use it to manufacture toys, cars, robots, cartoon, and other crafts.

✔ FULL RANGE & COST EFFICIENT: Package include : 1 x side pliers, 1 x manual model tools file, 1 x pen knife and blade,1 x polishing cloth, 2 x double-sided polished bar, 2 x tweezers. And the items are protected by a plastic box in case of damage. Meet all beginner’s basic requirements.

✔ DURABLE: Trimmer pen is tightly clamped and has high hardness, plastic handle, and anti-skid design. With safety protection cap to protect blade. The cutting pliers is made of carbon steels, good durability. The tweezers are made of high strength stainless steel, anti-static, anti-acid, anti-corrosion and anti-magnetic. Other items also have good quality.

✔ LIGHTWEIGHT & PORTABLE: Model tools, mini and light. When you use them, you will feel more handy. Packaged in plastic boxes, easy to carry and store, you can carve your products anytime and anywhere. Looking forward to your masterpiece!

✔ GREAT GIFTS: If you have an friend like animation, cartoon, and model very much, or she or he is a beginners of model, you can present this model as a gift to your friends directly, or use the model tools to create a gift for your cherished friend. After accepting your unique surprise, your friend must have tears in his or her eyes. Your unique gift stands for your unique love!
